fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select 50% of all players, rounded down.
- After two strikes have been reached, you may kill your target instantaneously at any time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you are assigned a target to haunt.
- You appear at the house of anyone who you visit, though only your target will know you are there - you are Astral to all other players.
- If your target visits someone you selected, they gain a strike and receive an ominous message about hearing faint giggling, or hearing bells chiming. After the second strike, they will see you directly and know that they saw a Ghost Girl.
- Only your target's abilities will have any effects on you until two strikes have been reached. Abilities *will* function the night you reach two strikes.
- If your target dies, gain a new target and reset strikes.
